page.title: 06FARMS
page.content: When we looked at the old School Admission Register we noticed that most of the children in the school came from families who worked on farms.Nowadays there are few people who actually work on the farms around here although we are told that the farms look better than they have ever done.This is because of the machinery which the farmers now use.Very often just a farmer and his wife will look after the farm all on their own.Most farmers here keep Friesian cows.They live on silage in the winter which they make during the summer when the cows can live in the fields.Most of the cows now wear computer collars so that their details are checked carefully.There are a lot of Chicken sheds around here.These are all run by Tiverton Poultry Group.
